Become a Tutor

Share Your Musical Knowledge!

Why Become a Tutor?

As a Paizo tutor, you'll have the opportunity to share your passion for music while helping others grow. Our tutoring program connects experienced musicians with students who are eager to learn and improve.

Whether you're skilled in classical instruments, music theory, or contemporary styles, there's always someone who could benefit from your expertise.

Tutor Requirements

Experience

At least 3 years of experience with your instrument or music theory knowledge

Commitment

Ability to commit to at least 2 hours per week for tutoring sessions

Patience

Patience and enthusiasm for teaching students of all skill levels

Become a Tutor

Fill out the form below to apply to become a Paizo tutor.
